request.description: Register a new user account. User will receive a verification email.
Authenticate user and receive JWT token. Token will be automatically saved to collection variable 'authToken'.
Get authenticated user's profile information. Requires JWT token.
Refresh an existing JWT token to get a new token with extended expiration.
Logout authenticated user. Note: JWT tokens are stateless, client should remove token from storage.
Request password reset link. An email with reset token will be sent to the user.
Reset password using token from email. Token expires after 1 hour. Replace {{resetToken}} with actual token from email.
Verify user email address using token from email. Replace {{verificationToken}} with actual token from email.
Resend email verification link to user's email address.

{
  "name": "TechEdge Template",
  "description": "Modern tech-style resume with sidebar layout and vibrant accent.",
  "category": "modern",
  "layout": {
    "sections": ["header", "summary", "skills", "experience", "education"],
    "sectionOrder": ["header", "summary", "skills", "experience", "education"],
    "orientation": "portrait",
    "columns": 2,
    "sectionSpacing": 18
  },
  "typography": {
    "fontFamily": "Helvetica",
    "headingSize": 20,
    "subheadingSize": 14,
    "bodySize": 11,
    "lineHeight": 1.6,
    "fontWeight": "normal"
  },
  "theme": {
    "primaryColor": "#0D47A1",
    "secondaryColor": "#1976D2",
    "accentColor": "#FFC107",
    "backgroundColor": "#FAFAFA",
    "textColor": "#212121",
    "customCSS": ".sidebar { background-color: #0D47A1; color: white; padding: 20px; }"
  },
  "pageSettings": {
    "format": "A4",
    "margins": { "top": 20, "bottom": 20, "left": 20, "right": 20 },
    "showPageNumbers": true,
    "pageNumberFormat": "Page 1 of N"
  },
  "isPremium": false,
  "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a new CV template with advanced customization options
Retrieve all available templates
Get a specific template by its ID
Update a template (partial update supported)
Delete a template
Create a minimal template with basic settings
Create template with custom CSS for advanced styling
Create a publicly shareable template with statistics tracking
Update statistics for public templates (views/downloads)
Get all CVs for the authenticated user
Get a specific CV by its ID
Get all CVs that use a specific template
Generate CV using the default CV for the authenticated user
Duplicate an existing CV with an optional new title

Update the order of sections in a CV. Valid section names: personal-info, professional-summary, work-experience, education, skills, certifications, projects, languages, volunteer, publications, awards, references, hobbies, patents, courses

Update which sections are enabled/visible in a CV. Valid section names: personal-info, professional-summary, work-experience, education, skills, certifications, projects, languages, volunteer, publications, awards, references, hobbies, patents, courses
Update the template used by a CV

body.raw:
{
  "firstname": "Jane",
  "lastname": "Smith",
  "email": "jane.smith@example.com",

  "country": "United States",

    },
    {

    }
  ]
}
